      • getDocInfo

        public DocInfo getDocInfo(int pageId,
                 int wordId)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method returns the doc info with the given page id and word id. If the doc info does not exist, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the page id containing the doc info
        Returns:
        wordId the word id of the doc info

        java.io.IOException

      • insertDocInfo

        public void insertDocInfo(int id,
                 DocInfo docInfo)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method inserts a doc info, if the doc info exists, it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        id - the doc id to be inserted
        pageInfo - the associated doc info to be inserted
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
